title: How to Make Microwave Moist Hershey Chocolate Cake

steps.headline: Pour in the Hershey powder, cake mix, and sugar into a microwaveable bowl.
Mix that in well but not too much that it gets all clumpy.
Pour in the milk and oil.
Mix all together well until smooth.
steps.description: make sure there are no clumps.

steps.headline: Make sure there is at least 1 ⁄2 inches (3.8 cm) of room left.
steps.description: look at tips for more info.

steps.headline: Put in microwave on high for 3 minutes.
Put plate on top of bowl then flip over.
Sprinkle some confectioners sugar on top.
Try patting the bottom of the bowl to get the cake out.

text: Pour in the Hershey powder, cake mix, and sugar into a microwaveable bowl.  Mix together well.  Spoon in one egg.  Mix that in well but not too much that it gets all clumpy.  Pour in the milk and oil.  Mix all together well until smooth. make sure there are no clumps. Make sure there is at least 1 ⁄2 inches (3.8 cm) of room left. look at tips for more info. Put in microwave on high for 3 minutes.  Take out cake.  Put plate on top of bowl then flip over.  Sprinkle some confectioners sugar on top.  Try patting the bottom of the bowl to get the cake out.  Finished.
